profile_photo::text_card_0::text: Shoot a variety of compositions when illustrating the process. Some wide shots, close-ups and medium shots. Your character does not have to be in every picture.
profile_photo::title: Profile Process
profile_photo::clip_card_3::goals[0]: Photograph the next significant step in the process.
profile_photo::clip_card_7::goals[0]: If the process has an audience, show their reaction.
profile_photo::clip_card_6::goals[0]: Shoot a photo that sums up the process.
profile_photo::clip_card_8::goals[0]: Capture your character as they complete the process.
profile_photo::clip_card_1::goals[0]: Show the very beginning or first step of the process.
profile_photo::clip_card_5::goals[0]: Photograph the next significant step in the process.
profile_photo::clip_card_0::goals[0]: Show your character getting ready to start the process.
profile_photo::clip_card_4::goals[0]: Photograph the next significant step in the process.
